mention.text: The November 23 lawsuit filed by a former staffer named Bradley Podliska , an Air Force reserve major who Gowdy , R - S.C. , fired in June for mishandling classified information
a former staffer named Bradley Podliska
the House Select Committee on Benghazi
Bradley Podliska asserting claims pursuant to the Congressional Accountability Act , among others
Podliska 's firing to damage Podliska 's reputation and his ability to seek or secure employment in his chosen field
several active members of the military
